text: Michael Erin Busch (January 4, 1947 â€“ April 7, 2019) was an American Democratic politician. He was the Speaker of the Maryland House of Delegates from January 8, 2003 until his death on April 7, 2019. Born in Baltimore, Maryland, Busch had been a member of the House since 1987. He represented District 30A, which is made-up of Anne Arundel County, including the state capital of Annapolis. Busch died at a hospital in Baltimore from problems caused by pneumonia following liver surgery on April 7, 2019, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Maryland Archives biography * Campaign website biography Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Michael E. Busch
